values: John Newton: The Tough Roots of His Habitual TendernessJohn Newton: The Tough Roots of His Habitual Tenderness

One of the deepest roots of Newton’s habitual tenderness was that he could not get over the wonder of his own rescue by sheer, triumphant grace.One of the deepest roots of Newton’s habitual tenderness was that he could not get over the wonder of his own rescue by sheer, triumphant grace.
